Source Sentence: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, secretary general of the Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins trade association representing some 7,000 wine producers across Europe, is dismissive of the concerns of the beer makers. He told Euronews that a market dominated by multinational brewing conglomerates bears no comparison with one comprised almost entirely of small, domestic producers.
Translation: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, generalsekreterare för branschorganisationen Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins, som företräder omkring 7 000 vinproducenter i Europa, avfärdar öltillverkarnas farhågor. Han sade till Euronews att en marknad som domineras av multinationella bryggerikonglomerat inte kan jämföras med en marknad som nästan uteslutande består av små inhemska producenter.
Reference Sentence: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte avfärdar öltillverkarnas oro. Han är generalsekreterare för branschorganisationen Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins som representerar 7 000 vintillverkare i Europa. Vidare förklarade han för Euronews att en marknad som domineras av multinationella bryggerikonglomerat inte kan jämföras med en som nästan enbart består av små inhemska producenter.

Source Sentence: Isn’t that funny? We have half the manpower left, and we can’t even refrain from hurting one another. I hastily sped up, Al’s was around the corner, so I would be fine inside. A glance behind me ensured that I was no longer being tailed as I stood in front of a bright glowing sign that read, “Alborn’s Pawnshop!” With slower steps, I entered once again–this place was more under the cover, as Alborn would often take in people who’d been mutated and snuck into Paltricus. Upon opening the door, the lights had been shut off, interestingly enough–there was no Al. No refugees. Nothing. Something wasn’t right here.
Translation: Är inte det roligt? Vi har hälften av arbetskraften kvar, och vi kan inte ens avstå från att skada varandra. Jag skyndade snabbt upp, Al var runt hörnet, så jag skulle inte vara bra inuti. En blick bakom mig såg till att jag inte längre var svansad som jag stod framför en ljus glödande skylt som läste: "Alborns Pawnshop var flyktingar!" Med långsammare steg gick jag in igen. Det här stället var mer
Reference Sentence: Är det inte lustigt? Hälften av mänskligheten finns kvar, och vi kan inte ens sluta att göra varandra illa. Jag ökade farten, Als ställe var precis runt hörnet, så jag skulle vara säker därinne. En snabb blick bakåt försäkrade mig om att jag inte var förföljd längre när jag stod framför en starkt upplyst skylt med texten "Alborns pantbank!". Med långsammare steg gick jag in åter en gång - detta stället hölls ganska hemligt, eftersom Alborn ofta släppte in människor som hade muterats och smitit in i Paltricus. När jag öppnade dörren var lamporna släckta och intressant nog - ingen Al. Inga flyktingar. Ingenting. Det var något som inte stämde här.

Source Sentence: So my dad can't give me rides to work. And for me, work is about 27 miles away. So there and back would be nearly a $100 a day with Uber. I haven't looked at Lyft. I could have, I guess, that makes sense. But I didn't have rental on my auto insurance, so that's my fault. So I guess I could have tried to do that and get that set up and tried to get a rental while I was down and out of a car. But even then, a rental wouldn't cover seven days. I'm going to sneeze, hold on. That sneeze sucked.
Translation: Så min pappa kan inte ge mig åka till jobbet. Och för mig är jobbet cirka 27 miles away. Så det och tillbaka skulle vara nästan $ 100 per dag med Uber. Jag har inte tittat på Lyft. Jag antar att det är vettigt. Men jag hade inte hyra på min bilförsäkring, så det är mitt fel. Så jag antar att jag kunde ha försökt att göra det och få det att sätta upp och försökte få en hyra ut.
Reference Sentence: Så min pappa kan inte skjutsa mig till jobbet. Och för mig är det omkring 27 miles till jobbet. Så fram och tillbaka skulle innebära nästan $100 per dag med Uber. Jag har inte tittat på Lyft. Det kunde jag ha gjort, antar jag, det vore vettigt. Men hyrbil ingick inte i min bilförsäkring, så det är mitt fel. Så jag antar att jag kunde ha försökt att göra det och få det arrangerat och försökt att få tag på en hyrbil medan jag var utan bil. Men även om jag gjorde det skulle en hyrbil inte täcka sju dagar. Source Sentence: When an arm is amputated, or a leg is amputated, for gangrene, or you lose it in war — for example, in the Iraq war, it's now a serious problem — you continue to vividly feel the presence of that missing arm, and that's called a phantom arm or a phantom leg.

Reference Sentence: När en arm eller ett ben amputeras på grund av kallbrand eller förloras i ett krig, till exempel kriget i Irak. Det är idag ett allvarligt problem. Man fortsätter att påtagligt känna den förlorade armens närvaro. Viken benämns fantomarm eller fantomben.

Source Sentence: Tenuk hesitated, then stepped back, giving himself some space. With a low, slightly pained grunt, Tenuk's body stretched out, his fur replaced with scales and his arms replaced with wings. He quickly turned himself into a normal, light blue Thraki, but his eyes remained red.
Translation: Tenuk hikaði, steig síðan til baka og gaf sér pláss. Hann breytti fljótt sjálfum sér í venjulegt, ljósblátt Thraki, en augu hans voru áfram rauð.
Reference Sentence: Tenuk hikaði andartak, tók síðan tvö skref aftur á bak til að gefa sjálfum sér eilítið pláss. Hann gaf frá sér lága erfiðisstunu og svo tók líkami hans að lengjast. Feldurinn hans vék fyrir hreistri og hendur hans umbreyttust í vængi. Hann breytti sér snarlega í ljósbláan þraka. Bara augun, sem voru ennþá rauð, stungu í stúf.

Source Sentence: Isn’t that funny? We have half the manpower left, and we can’t even refrain from hurting one another. I hastily sped up, Al’s was around the corner, so I would be fine inside. A glance behind me ensured that I was no longer being tailed as I stood in front of a bright glowing sign that read, “Alborn’s Pawnshop!” With slower steps, I entered once again–this place was more under the cover, as Alborn would often take in people who’d been mutated and snuck into Paltricus. Upon opening the door, the lights had been shut off, interestingly enough–there was no Al. No refugees. Nothing. Something wasn’t right here.
Translation: Er það ekki fyndið? Við höfum helming mannvirki vinstri, og við getum ekki einu sinni forðast að meiða hvert annað. Ég flýtti skyndilega upp, Al er var handan við hornið, svo ég myndi ekki vera fínt inni. A líta á bak við mig tryggði að ég væri ekki lengur tailed eins og ég stóð fyrir framan björt glóandi skilti sem lesa, "Alborn er Pawnshop!" Með hægar skref, ég inn aftur.
Reference Sentence: Er það ekki einkennilegt að okkur hefur fækkað um helming og samt tekst okkur ekki að komast hjá því að vinna hvert öðru mein? Ég greikkaði sporið. Veðlánabúð Als var bara hinum megin við hornið og ég yrði óhult þegar ég væri komin þangað inn. Þar sem ég stóð undir glóandi skilti sem á stóð Veðlánabúð Alborns leit ég við til að ganga úr skugga um að enginn hefði veitt mér eftirför. Ég hægði á mér og steig inn í þessa kunnuglegu veröld. Búðin var hálfgert leynifylgsni þar sem Alborn tók oft á móti stökkbreyttu fólki sem hafði smyglað sér leið inn í Paltricus. Ljósin voru slökkt þegar ég kom inn, og af einhverjum ástæðum var Alborn hvergi að finna. Hér voru engir flóttamenn og ekkert að sjá. Eitthvað var ekki eins og það átti að vera.

Source Sentence: The results are in and, drum roll, please, it's completely consistent with my family history. 89.9% British and Irish with most of that concentrated in the scottish borders, western Ireland, Wales, and cornwall. Translation: Niðurstöður eru í og, tromma rúlla, vinsamlegast, það er alveg í samræmi við fjölskyldusögu mína. 89,9% Bretar og rar með mest af því einbeitt í Scottish landamærum, Vestur-rlandi, Wales, og Cornwall. Það sýnir ekki mikið breton tho svo annaðhvort þeir eru svo nálægt cornish þeir sýna ekki eins mismunandi í mér eða breton fjölskyldan mín var ekki upphaflega þaðan.
Reference Sentence: Niðurstöðurnar eru komnar og, bíðið eftir því, þær eru nákvæmlega eins og ætla mætti út frá fjölskyldusögu minni. 89,9% Breti og Íri, mestmegnis dreift meðfram landamærum Skotlands, frá Vestur-Írlandi, Wales og Cornwall. Það er ekkert svo mikið frá Bretaníu, þannig að annaðhvort er fólkið þar of líkt kornísku fólki eða þá að Bretaníuhluti fjölskyldunnar er ekki í alvöru þaðan.

Source Sentence: Enlargement could not, except by deliberately sacrificing the balances too painfully achieved over the years, translate into a transfer from the countries of cohesion towards the candidates for membership, without coming up with other systems for the regions with the weakest incomes.
Translation: Udvidelsen kunne ikke udmønte sig i en overførsel fra samhørighedslandene til ansøgerlandene, medmindre man bevidst ofrede balancen for smerteligt i årenes løb, uden at finde andre systemer for de regioner, der har de svageste indkomster.
Reference Sentence: Medmindre man med fuldt overlæg ofrer den balance, der er opnået med så stort besvær igennem årene, kan udvidelsen ikke gennemføres ved en overførsel fra samhørighedslandene til ansøgerlandene, uden at man forestiller sig andre systemer for de lønmæssigt svagest stillede regioner.

Source Sentence: Therefore, all I can tell you is that the only instrument at a European level that can prick the consciences of the Member States is this Parliament, and so I encourage you to put forward a motion or a parliamentary resolution to get this subject on the table, so it can be a wake-up call for the Member States' governments.
Translation: Derfor kan jeg kun fortælle Dem, at det eneste instrument på europæisk plan, der kan skade medlemsstaternes samvittighed, er Parlamentet, og derfor opfordrer jeg Dem til at fremsætte et forslag eller en beslutning fra Parlamentet for at få dette emne på bordet, så det kan være en opvågning for medlemsstaternes regeringer.
Reference Sentence: Derfor kan jeg kun sige til Dem, at det eneste instrument på europæisk plan, der kan vække medlemslandenes forståelse, er Europa-Parlamentet, og jeg opfordrer det derfor til at fremme et forslag eller en beslutning herom, at det får dette spørgsmål på bordet, at det bliver en opfordring til medlemslandenes regeringer.

Source Sentence: on behalf of the ALDE Group. - (FR) Mr President, ladies and gentlemen, if there is one area in which all Europeans expect effective Community responses, it is that of large-scale natural disasters.
Translation: for ALDE-Gruppen. - (FR) Hr. formand, mine damer og herrer! Hvis der er et område, hvor alle europæere forventer effektive fællesskabsreaktioner, er det store naturkatastrofer.
Reference Sentence: Hr. formand, mine damer og herrer! Hvis der er et område, på hvilket alle europæere forventer en effektiv fællesskabsreaktion, er det i forbindelse med store naturkatastrofer.

Reference Sentence: A4-0181/97 af Christodoulou for Udvalget om Økonomi, Valutaspørgsmål og Industripolitik om: I.indstilling ved andenbehandling om Rådets fælles holdning fastlagt med henblik på vedtagelse af Rådets forordning om styrkelse af overvågningen af budgetstillinger samt overvågning og samordning af økonomiske politikker (C4-0174/97-96/0247(SYN)) og II. betænkning om forslag til Rådets forordning om fremskyndelse og afklaring af gennemførelsen af proceduren i forbindelse med uforholdsmæssigt store underskud (6931/2/97 - C4-0182/97-96/0248(CNS)) og-betænkning (A4-0184/97) af Randzio-Plath for Udvalget om Økonomi, Valutaspørgsmål og Industripolitik om Kommissionens henstilling om de overordnede retningslinjer for 1997 for medlemsstaterne og Fællesskabets økonomiske politikker (KOM(97)0168 - C4-0190/97).

Source Sentence: However, Tenuk and Kayel quickly realized they weren't alone. A second dark creature shot out from beneath them, and Tenuk only just managed to avoid a collision.

Source Sentence: Tenuk hesitated, then stepped back, giving himself some space. With a low, slightly pained grunt, Tenuk's body stretched out, his fur replaced with scales and his arms replaced with wings. He quickly turned himself into a normal, light blue Thraki, but his eyes remained red.
Translation: Tenuk tøvede, trådte derefter tilbage og gav sig selv lidt plads. Med en lav, let smertet grynt, Tenuks krop strakt ud, hans pels erstattet med skalaer og hans arme erstattet med vinger. Han forvandlede sig hurtigt til en normal, lyseblå Thraki, men hans øjne forblev røde.
Reference Sentence: Tenuk tøvede lidt, men trådte så et skridt tilbage, så han fik lidt mere plads. Med et lavt, lettere smertefuldt grynt strakte Tenuks krop sig ud. Hans pels blev til skæl, og hans arme blev til vinger. På et øjeblik var han forvandlet til en almindelig, lyseblå thraki, men hans øjne var stadig røde.

Source Sentence: They wondered if she would actually let them enter, unlike the previous times they went to ask. I still have a bruise from the last time. Ivory chuckled from the memory. Kari had thrown a book at their shoulder, but when she saw who it was, she apologized immediately.
Translation: De spekulerede på, om hun faktisk ville lade dem komme ind, i modsætning til de tidligere gange, de gik for at spørge. Jeg har stadig et blåt mærke fra sidste gang. Elfenben chuckled fra hukommelsen. Kari havde kastet en bog på deres skulder, men da hun så, hvem det var, undskyldte hun straks.
Reference Sentence: De spekulerede på, om hun rent faktisk ville lade dem komme ind denne gang, til forskel fra de andre gange, hvor de havde spurgt. "Jeg har stadig en blå plet fra sidste gang," fnisede Ivory ved tanken. Kari havde kastet en bog efter dem, men da hun så, hvem det var, havde hun straks sagt undskyld.

Source Sentence: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, secretary general of the Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins trade association representing some 7,000 wine producers across Europe, is dismissive of the concerns of the beer makers. He told Euronews that a market dominated by multinational brewing conglomerates bears no comparison with one comprised almost entirely of small, domestic producers.
Translation: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, generalsekretær for Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins, der repræsenterer omkring 7.000 vinproducenter i hele Europa, er afvisende over for ølproducenternes bekymringer. Han fortalte Euronews, at et marked domineret af multinationale bryggerikonglomerater ikke bærer nogen sammenligning med en, der næsten udelukkende består af små, indenlandske producenter.
Reference Sentence: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, generalsekretær for handelsforeningen Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins, der repræsenterer omkring 7.000 vinproducenter i hele Europa, afviser ølproducenternes bekymringer. Han udtalte til Euronews, at et marked domineret af multinationale bryggerikonglomerater ikke kan sammenlignes med et marked, der næsten udelukkende består af små, indenlandske producenter.

Source Sentence: Isn’t that funny? We have half the manpower left, and we can’t even refrain from hurting one another. I hastily sped up, Al’s was around the corner, so I would be fine inside. A glance behind me ensured that I was no longer being tailed as I stood in front of a bright glowing sign that read, “Alborn’s Pawnshop!” With slower steps, I entered once again–this place was more under the cover, as Alborn would often take in people who’d been mutated and snuck into Paltricus. Upon opening the door, the lights had been shut off, interestingly enough–there was no Al. No refugees. Nothing. Something wasn’t right here.
Translation: Er det ikke sjovt? Vi har halvdelen af arbejdskraften tilbage, og vi kan ikke engang afstå fra at skade hinanden. Jeg skyndte mig op, Al var rundt om hjørnet, så jeg ville ikke være fint inde. Et blik bag mig sikrede, at jeg ikke længere blev tailed, da jeg stod foran et lyst glødende skilt, der læste: "Alborn's Pawnshop!" Med langsommere trin var jeg kommet ind igen.
Reference Sentence: Er det ikke underligt? Der er kun halvdelen af styrken tilbage, og alligevel kan vi ikke lade være med at skade hinanden. Jeg skyndte mig at sætte farten op, Al's lå lige om hjørnet, så jeg ville være i sikkerhed derinde. Med et blik bagud sikrede jeg mig, at jeg ikke længere blev forfulgt, da jeg stod foran et lysende skilt med teksten: "Alborn's Pawnshop!" Med langsomme skridt gik jeg ind – dette sted var et beskyttet sted, da Alborn ofte tog imod folk, der var blevet muteret og havde sneget sig ind i Paltricus. Da jeg åbnede døren, var lyset mærkeligt nok slukket – og Al var der ikke. Ingen flygtninge, ingenting. Der var noget galt her.

Source Sentence: So my dad can't give me rides to work. And for me, work is about 27 miles away. So there and back would be nearly a $100 a day with Uber. I haven't looked at Lyft. I could have, I guess, that makes sense. But I didn't have rental on my auto insurance, so that's my fault. So I guess I could have tried to do that and get that set up and tried to get a rental while I was down and out of a car. But even then, a rental wouldn't cover seven days. I'm going to sneeze, hold on. That sneeze sucked.
Translation: Så min far kan ikke give mig rides til arbejde. Og for mig, arbejde er omkring 27 miles væk. Så der og tilbage ville være næsten en $ 100 om dagen med Uber. Jeg har ikke kigget på Lyft. Jeg kunne have, jeg tror, det giver mening. Men jeg havde ikke leje på min bil forsikring, så det er min skyld. Så jeg tror, jeg kunne have forsøgt at gøre det og få det sat op og forsøgte at få en udlejning, mens jeg var ude.
Reference Sentence: Så min far kan ikke køre mig på arbejde. Og for mig er arbejdet omkring 43 kilometer væk. Så frem og tilbage ville koste næsten 700 kroner om dagen med Uber. Jeg har ikke tjekket Lyft. Det kunne jeg måske have gjort, det giver mening. Men jeg havde ikke lejebil inkluderet i min bilforsikring, så det er min fejl. Så jeg kunne nok have prøvet at gøre det og få det ordnet og så prøvet at leje en bil, mens jeg var uden bil. Men selv da ville en lejebil ikke dække syv dage. Jeg skal nyse, vent lige. Det nys var ikke godt.

Source Sentence: Rosendale, a member of the hard-right Freedom Caucus, was one of the individuals who derailed the Wednesday votes. He views the top line number in Johnson's deal as being too high and as doing too little to cut the $34 trillion national debt.

Source Sentence: South Wales four-piece The Now are proud to release their debut album, Too Hot To Handle, via True Music, and Callum joins me now. How are you doing, Callum? How's it going? Yeah, all good. Good, yourself? Yes, I'm very good. Thank you. It's a privilege to speak to yourselves because I've been listening to your music quite a lot since 2023. So I'm just loving the music, and I think it's something that we definitely need in the charts these days.

Ja, alt godt. Godt, dig selv? Ja, jeg er meget god. Tak. Det er et privilegium at tale med jer selv, fordi jeg har lyttet til din musik ret meget siden 2023. Så jeg tror bare, at vi elsker musikken.
Reference Sentence: Den walisiske kvartet The Now er stolte af at udgive deres debutalbum, Too Hot To Handle, via True Music, og Callum slutter sig til mig nu. Hvordan har du det, Callum? Hvordan går det? Ja, alt er godt. Godt, selv? Ja, jeg har det rigtig godt. Tak. Det er en ære at tale med jer, for jeg har lyttet en del til jeres musik siden 2023. Source Sentence: The results are in and, drum roll, please, it's completely consistent with my family history. 89.9% British and Irish with most of that concentrated in the scottish borders, western Ireland, Wales, and cornwall. It doesn't show much breton tho so either they're so close to cornish they don't show as different in me or my breton family wasn't originally from there.
Translation: Resultaterne er i og, trommerulle, tak, det er helt i overensstemmelse med min familiehistorie. 89,9% britiske og irske med det meste af det koncentreret i de skotske grænser, vestlige Irland, Wales og cornwall. Det viser ikke meget breton tho så enten de er så tæt på cornish de ikke viser så anderledes i mig eller min breton familie var ikke oprindeligt derfra.
Reference Sentence: Resultaterne er kommet, og de er fuldstændig i overensstemmelse med min familiehistorie. Jeg er 89,9% britisk og irsk, med det meste er fra de skotske grænseområder, det vestlige Irland, Wales og Cornwall. Der er dog ikke meget bretonsk, så enten er slægtskabet med kornisk så tæt, at det ikke kan ses i mig, eller også kom den bretonske del af min familie ikke derfra oprindeligt.

Rekao je Euronewsu da tržište koje dominira multinacionalni konglomerati za kuhanje ne može se usporediti s trgovačkom udrugom koja se sastoji skoro u cijelosti od malih domaćih proizvođača.

Source Sentence: Isn’t that funny? We have half the manpower left, and we can’t even refrain from hurting one another. I hastily sped up, Al’s was around the corner, so I would be fine inside. A glance behind me ensured that I was no longer being tailed as I stood in front of a bright glowing sign that read, “Alborn’s Pawnshop!” With slower steps, I entered once again–this place was more under the cover, as Alborn would often take in people who’d been mutated and snuck into Paltricus. Upon opening the door, the lights had been shut off, interestingly enough–there was no Al. No refugees. Nothing. Something wasn’t right here.
Translation: Nije li to smiješno? Imamo pola ljudske snage lijevo, a mi ne možemo ni suzdržati od povrijediti jedni druge. Pobrzo sam ubrzao, Al's je bio iza ugla, tako da bih bio u redu unutra. Pogled iza mene osigurao da me više nije bio pratio dok sam stajao pred svijetlim sjajnim znakom koji čita, “Alborn's Pawnshop!” Sa sporijim korakima, ušao sam još jednom – ovo mjesto je bilo više ispod naslovnice, kao što je Alborn često uzimao u ljudima koji su bili mutirani i ušuljani u Paltrik. Nakon otvaranja vrata, svjetla su bila ugašena, zanimljivo – nije bilo Al. Nema izbjeglica. Ništa. Nešto nije bilo ovdje.
Reference Sentence: Nije li to smiješno? Preostala nam je polovica radne snage, a ne možemo se suzdržati od toga da jedni druge ozljeđujemo. Žurno sam ubrzala. Alova zalagaonica bila je odmah iza ugla, pa ću tamo biti sigurna. Osvrnula sam se kako bih provjerila prate li me i zastala ispred jarkog svjetlećeg znaka na kojem je pisalo "Albornova zalagaonica!" Usporila sam korak i ušla. Mjesto je bilo više manje-više tajno jer bi Alborn često skrivao mutirane ili prošvercane u Paltricus. Kad sam otvorila vrata, svjetla su bila ugašena i štoviše, nigdje nije bilo Ala. Ni izbjeglica. Nikoga. Nešto nije bilo u redu.

I'm going to sneeze, hold on. That sneeze sucked.

Reference Sentence: Kao svaka rastuća organizacija u svojim početcima, na neki način smo preplavljeni sa vlastitim rastom. To znači da dobivamo ogromnu količinu informacija od strane zviždača veoma visokog kalibra, ali nemamo dovoljno ljudi da zapravo istraže sve te informacije.

Source Sentence: (DE) Mr President, ladies and gentlemen, once again this very basic question poses itself: are environmental protection, climate protection and financial and industrial policy compatible?
Translation: (DE) Panie przewodniczący, panie i panowie! Po raz kolejny zadaje się to bardzo podstawowe pytanie: czy ochrona środowiska, ochrona klimatu oraz polityka finansowa i przemysłowa są zgodne?
Reference Sentence: (DE) Panie przewodniczący, panie i panowie! Jeszcze raz to podstawowe pytanie nasuwa się samo: czy polityka ochrony środowiska, ochrony klimatu oraz polityka finansowa i przemysłowa są ze sobą zgodne?

Source Sentence: It is a reality that we in Ireland are not comfortable with, but we accept the right of all countries to choose their own energy mix, and the fact that our neighbours utilise nuclear power means that we cannot afford to ignore the issue.
Translation: To jest rzeczywistość, z którą my w Irlandii nie czujemy się komfortowo, ale akceptujemy prawo wszystkich krajów do wyboru własnej mieszanki energetycznej, a fakt, że nasi sąsiedzi wykorzystują energię jądrową, oznacza, że nie możemy sobie pozwolić na ignorowanie tej kwestii.
Reference Sentence: Rzeczywistością jest również to, że w Irlandii akceptujemy prawo każdego kraju do własnego wyboru kombinacji źródeł energii, choć nie czujemy się z tym komfortowo, a fakt, że nasi sąsiedzi korzystają z energii jądrowej oznacza, że nie możemy tego ignorować.

Source Sentence: It is unacceptable that energy market inefficiencies are distorting the market to the detriment of businesses and consumers.

Source Sentence: 'Levels of knowledge of the Treaty suggest public opinion [in Ireland] is more like Nice 1 than Nice 2' - the words of Professor Richard Sinnott, not mine.
Translation: "Poziom wiedzy w Traktacie sugeruje opinię publiczną [w Irlandii] jest bardziej jak Nicea 1 niż Nicea 2" - słowa profesora Richarda Sinnotta, nie moje.

Source Sentence: I think a referendum is the best way forward because it is the most direct form of democracy and it would bring Europe closer to its citizens and their freedom of choice.
Translation: Uważam, że referendum jest najlepszą drogą do przodu, ponieważ jest to najbardziej bezpośrednia forma demokracji i przybliżyłby Europę do swoich obywateli i ich wolność wyboru.

Source Sentence: I would like to say to all new Members of the European Parliament that the Minister is a former Member of this House, and so is one of us.

Source Sentence: We have worked with the European Environment Agency on a report assessing the frequency of disasters in Europe and their impact on humans, the economies and ecosystems.

Source Sentence: I deem this to be very serious and would ask Members to consider the fact that, while many might not fully understand the science of this, if we do not accept the Socialist amendment and accept the PPE amendment, it means that we are going against the advice of scientists and are creating two total allowable catch areas within a single stock.
Translation: Uważam, że jest to bardzo poważne i zwracam się do posłów o rozważenie faktu, że choć wielu może nie w pełni zrozumieć tej nauki, jeśli nie zaakceptujemy poprawki socjalistów i nie zaakceptujemy poprawki do ŚOI, oznacza to, że idziemy przeciwko doradztwu naukowców i tworzymy dwa całkowitie dopuszczalne obszary połowowe w ramach jednego zasobu.
Reference Sentence: Uważam to za bardzo ważne i mimo że wielu z posłów może nie w pełni rozumieć uzasadnienie naukowe, to proszę wziąć pod uwagę, że jeśli nie przyjmiemy poprawki Socjalistów, a przyjmiemy poprawkę PPE, to postąpimy wbrew opinii naukowców i utworzymy dwa obszary całkowitych dopuszczalnych połowów dla jednego stada.

Source Sentence: However, Tenuk and Kayel quickly realized they weren't alone. A second dark creature shot out from beneath them, and Tenuk only just managed to avoid a collision.
Translation: Tenuk i Kayel szybko zdali sobie sprawę, że nie są sami.
Reference Sentence: Aczkolwiek Tenuk i Kayel błyskawicznie uzmysłowili sobie, że nie są tam sami. Kolejne mroczne stworzenie wystrzeliło w górę spod nich, a Tenuk ledwie zdołał uniknąć zderzenia.

Source Sentence: Tenuk hesitated, then stepped back, giving himself some space. With a low, slightly pained grunt, Tenuk's body stretched out, his fur replaced with scales and his arms replaced with wings. He quickly turned himself into a normal, light blue Thraki, but his eyes remained red.
Translation: Tenuk wahał się, potem odszedł, dając sobie trochę miejsca. Z niskim, lekko bolesnym grunting, ciało Tenuk rozciągnął, jego futro zastąpiło wagi i jego ramiona zastąpione skrzydłami. Szybko przekształcił się w normalny, lekko niebieski Traki, ale jego oczy pozostawały czerwone.
Reference Sentence: Tenuk zwlekał, a następnie odsunął się, robiąc sobie więcej miejsca. Wydał słabe, trochę bolesne jękniecie, a jego ciało wyciągnęło się, sierść przeobraziła się w łuski, a ramiona zamieniły się w skrzydła. Błyskawicznie przekształcił się w zwyczajnego, jasnoniebieskiego Thrakiego, ale jego oczy dalej były czerwone.

Source Sentence: They wondered if she would actually let them enter, unlike the previous times they went to ask. I still have a bruise from the last time. Ivory chuckled from the memory. Kari had thrown a book at their shoulder, but when she saw who it was, she apologized immediately.

Ivory zaśmiała się, przypominając o tym sobie. Kari cisnęła księgą w jej ramię, ale kiedy dostrzegła, w kogo rzuciła, od razu przeprosiła.

Source Sentence: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, secretary general of the Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins trade association representing some 7,000 wine producers across Europe, is dismissive of the concerns of the beer makers. He told Euronews that a market dominated by multinational brewing conglomerates bears no comparison with one comprised almost entirely of small, domestic producers.
Translation: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, sekretarz generalny komitetu Européen des Entreprises Vins, reprezentującego około 7000 producentów wina w całej Europie, odrzuca obawy wytwórców piwa. Poinformował Euronews, że rynek zdominowany przez wielonarodowe konglomeraty konglomeracyjne nie jest porównywany z tym, który składa się niemal w całości z małych, krajowych producentów.
Reference Sentence: Ignacio Sanchez Recarte, sekretarz generalny stowarzyszenia handlowego Comite Europeen des Entrerprises Vins, które reprezentuje około 7000 producentów win w Europie, nie podziela obaw piwowarów. Powiedział Euronews, że rynek zdominowany przez międzynarodowe koncerny piwowarskie nie stanowi porównania z pojedynczym rynkiem składającym się praktycznie w całości z małych, lokalnych producentów.

Source Sentence: Isn’t that funny? We have half the manpower left, and we can’t even refrain from hurting one another. I hastily sped up, Al’s was around the corner, so I would be fine inside. A glance behind me ensured that I was no longer being tailed as I stood in front of a bright glowing sign that read, “Alborn’s Pawnshop!” With slower steps, I entered once again–this place was more under the cover, as Alborn would often take in people who’d been mutated and snuck into Paltricus. Upon opening the door, the lights had been shut off, interestingly enough–there was no Al. No refugees. Nothing. Something wasn’t right here.
Translation: Czyż nie jest to zabawne? Mamy połowę ludzkości pozostawioną, a nie możemy nawet powstrzymać się od bólu nawzajem. Pośpiesznie skoczyłem, Al's był za rogiem, więc byłbym w porządku wewnątrz. Ogląd za mną gwarantował, że nie byłem już śledzony, gdy stałem przed jasnym świecącym znakem, który czytał, “Alborn's Pawnshop!” Z wolniejszymi krokami, wszedłem jeszcze raz – to miejsce było bardziej pod okładką, jak Alborn często bierze ludzi, którzy byli mutowane i wkradane do Paltricus. Po otwarciu drzwi, światła były zamknięte, ciekawie – nie było Al. Brak uchodźców. Nic. Coś tu nie było.
Reference Sentence: Czyż to nie jest śmieszne? Dysponujemy tylko połową zasobów ludzkich i nie potrafimy nawet zaniechać wyrządzania sobie krzywdy. Bezzwłocznie przyspieszyłam kroku, lokal Ala znajdował się za zakrętem, a wewnątrz będę bezpieczna. Obejrzawszy się za siebie, uświadomiłam sobie, że nikt już za mną nie idzie. Stałam przed rozświetlonym szyldem, na którym widniał napis: „Lombard Alborna!”. Idąc już wolniej, weszłam do środka ponownie – ten lokal dział raczej pod przykrywką, gdyż Alborn regularnie gościł ludzi po przejściu mutacji, którzy przekradli się na teren Paltricusa. Jak tylko otworzyłam drzwi, światła zgasły, co ciekawe – Ala tam nie było. Zero uchodźców. Nikogo. Wydarzyło się tu coś niedobrego.

Source Sentence: South Wales four-piece The Now are proud to release their debut album, Too Hot To Handle, via True Music, and Callum joins me now. How are you doing, Callum? How's it going? So I'm just loving the music, and I think it's something that we definitely need in the charts these days.
Translation: Południowa Walia Cztery kawałek The Now są dumni, że wydają swój debiutancki album, Too Hot To Mall, za pośrednictwem True Music, i Callum dołącza do mnie teraz. Jak ci idzie, Callum? Jak to idzie? Tak, wszystko dobrze. Dobrze, sam? Tak, jestem bardzo dobry. Dziękuję. To przywilej, aby rozmawiać ze sobą, ponieważ słucham twojej muzyki dość dużo od 2023 roku. Więc kocham muzykę, i myślę, że to jest coś, czego potrzebujemy obecnie na wykresach.
Reference Sentence: The Now, zespół w czteroosobowym składzie z południowej Walii, ma zaszczyt ogłosić wydanie swojego debiutanckiego albumu „Too Hot To Handle” w ramach projektu True Music. W tym momencie dołącza do mnie Callum. Co u ciebie, Callum? Co słychać? Tak, wszystko w porządku. U ciebie dobrze? Tak, mam się doskonale. Dzięki. Ja najzwyczajniej uwielbiam tę muzykę i uważam, że bez wątpienia zasługujemy na taki rodzaj muzyki na współczesnych listach przebojów.

Source Sentence: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, secretary general of the Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins trade association representing some 7,000 wine producers across Europe, is dismissive of the concerns of the beer makers. He told Euronews that a market dominated by multinational brewing conglomerates bears no comparison with one comprised almost entirely of small, domestic producers.
Translation: Игнасио Санчес Рекарт, генерален секретар на търговската асоциация Comit Europen des Entreprises Vins, представляваща около 7000 производители на вино в цяла Европа, е пренебрежителен към опасенията на производителите на бира. Той заяви пред Euronews, че пазар, доминиран от мултинационални пивоварни конгломерати, не може да се сравнява с такъв, съставен почти изцяло от малки местни производители.
Reference Sentence: Игнасио Санчез Рекарте, генерален секретар на търговската асоциация Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins, представляваща около 7000 винопроизводители от цяла Европа, не приема притесненията на производителите на бира. Той заяви за Euronews, че пазарът, доминиран от мултинационални пивоварни конгломерати, не може по никакъв начин да се сравнява с пазар, съставен почти изцяло от малки местни производители.

Source Sentence: Isn’t that funny? We have half the manpower left, and we can’t even refrain from hurting one another. I hastily sped up, Al’s was around the corner, so I would be fine inside. A glance behind me ensured that I was no longer being tailed as I stood in front of a bright glowing sign that read, “Alborn’s Pawnshop!” With slower steps, I entered once again–this place was more under the cover, as Alborn would often take in people who’d been mutated and snuck into Paltricus. Upon opening the door, the lights had been shut off, interestingly enough–there was no Al. No refugees. Nothing. Something wasn’t right here.
Translation: Не е ли смешно? Остана ни половината работна ръка и дори не можем да се въздържим да не се нараним един друг. Набързо затворих вратата, Ал'с беше зад ъгъла, така че щях да съм добре вътре. Погледът зад мен гарантираше, че вече няма да ме следят, докато стоях пред светъл светъл знак, на който пишеше:Заложната къща на Алборн!“ С по-бавни стъпки влязох отново на това място.
Reference Sentence: Не е ли забавно? Намаляхме наполовина и дори не можем да спрем да се нараняваме сами. Забързах се, Aл беше зад ъгъла и щях да съм на сигурно място вътре. Погледнах зад мен да се уверя, че не ме следят, докато стоях пред светла табела „Заложната къща на Алборн!“. С бавни крачки влязох вътре – това беше място под прикритие, защото Алборн приютяваше мутирали хора и ги вмъкваше в Палтрикус. След като отворих вратата, светлините бяха загасени, а по-интересното – Ал го нямаше. Нямаше бежанци. Нищо. Нещо не беше наред.

Translation: Розендейл, член на крайнодясната партия Freedom Caucus, беше един от хората, които дерайлираха гласуването в сряда. Той смята, че номерът на горната линия в сделката на Джонсън е твърде висок и прави твърде малко, за да намали националния дълг от 34 трилиона долара.
Reference Sentence: Розендейл, член на крайнодесния партиен актив Freedom Caucus, беше един от онези членове, които попречиха на гласуванията в сряда. Той счита числото от сделката на Джонсън за твърде голямо и недостатъчно, за да намали националния дълг, възлизащ на 34 трилиона щатски долара.

Source Sentence: South Wales four-piece The Now are proud to release their debut album, Too Hot To Handle, via True Music, and Callum joins me now. How are you doing, Callum? How's it going? Reference Sentence: Квартетът The Now от Южен Уелс с гордост издадоха своя дебютен албум, Too Hot To Handle, чрез True Music и Калъм е при мен сега. Как си, Калъм? Как върви? Всичко е наред. Source Sentence: Another way of thinking about it is instead of thinking of babies and children as being like defective grownups, we should think about them as being a different developmental stage of the same species — kind of like caterpillars and butterflies — except that they're actually the brilliant butterflies who are flitting around the garden and exploring, and we're the caterpillars who are inching along our narrow, grownup, adult path.
Translation: Друг начин на мислене за това е вместо да мислим за бебета и деца като за дефектни възрастни, трябва да мислим за тях като за различен етап на развитие на един и същи вид - нещо като гъсеници и пеперуди - с изключение на това, че те всъщност са блестящите пеперуди, които летят из градината и изследват, а ние сме гъсениците, които се впиват по нашия тесен, възрастен, възрастен път.
Reference Sentence: Друг начин да погледнем на нещата е вместо да мислим за бебетата и децата като дефектни възрастни е да гледаме на тях като на различна фаза от развитието на същият вид — например като гъсениците и пеперудите — само че, те всъщност са прекрасните пеперуди, които летят из градината и проучват, а ние сме гъсениците, които напредваме по нашият тесен, пораснал път на възрастни.

Source Sentence: Isn’t that funny? We have half the manpower left, and we can’t even refrain from hurting one another. I hastily sped up, Al’s was around the corner, so I would be fine inside. Upon opening the door, the lights had been shut off, interestingly enough–there was no Al. No refugees. Nothing. Something wasn’t right here.
Translation: Nije li to smiješno? Imamo pola ljudstva lijevo, a ne možemo se čak suzdržati od ranjavanja jedni druge. Ja sam brzo ubrzao, Al's je bio iza ugla, tako da bih biti u redu iznutra. Pogled iza mene osigurao da sam više ne bude rep kao što sam stajao ispred svijetle svjetleći znak koji čita, “Alborn's Pawnshop!” S sporijim koracima, ušao sam još jednom ovo mjesto je bio više pod okriljem, kao Alborn bi često uzeti u ljudima koji su mutirali i ušuljao se u Paltricus. Po otvaranju vrata, svjetla je bio isključen, zanimljivo je da je nema Al. Ništa. Nešto nije bilo upravo ovdje.
Reference Sentence: Nije li to smiješno? Preostala nam je polovica radne snage, a ne možemo se suzdržati od toga da jedni druge ozljeđujemo. Žurno sam ubrzala. Alova zalagaonica bila je odmah iza ugla, pa ću tamo biti sigurna. Osvrnula sam se kako bih provjerila prate li me i zastala ispred jarkog svjetlećeg znaka na kojem je pisalo "Albornova zalagaonica!" Usporila sam korak i ušla. Mjesto je bilo više manje-više tajno jer bi Alborn često skrivao mutirane ili prošvercane u Paltricus. Kad sam otvorila vrata, svjetla su bila ugašena i štoviše, nigdje nije bilo Ala. Ni izbjeglica. Nikoga. Nešto nije bilo u redu.

Source Sentence: South Wales four-piece The Now are proud to release their debut album, Too Hot To Handle, via True Music, and Callum joins me now. How are you doing, Callum? How's it going? Yeah, all good. Good, yourself? Yes, I'm very good. Thank you. It's a privilege to speak to yourselves because I've been listening to your music quite a lot since 2023. So I'm just loving the music, and I think it's something that we definitely need in the charts these days.
Translation: Južni Wales četverodijelni The Now su ponosni objaviti svoj debitantski album, Too Hot To Handle, preko True Music, i Callum mi se pridružuje sada. Kako ste, Callum? Kako ide? Da, sve dobro. Dobro, sami? Da, ja sam vrlo dobro. Hvala. To je privilegija razgovarati sa sobom jer sam slušajući svoju glazbu prilično puno od 2023. Dakle, ja sam samo volim glazbu, i mislim da je nešto što definitivno trebamo u grafikonima ovih dana.
Reference Sentence: Četvorka iz južnog Walesa, The Now, ponosno objavljuje svoj debitantski album, Too Hot To Handle, putem True Musica, a Callum će mi se sad pridružiti. Kako si, Callum? Kako ide? Da, sve je super. Dobro, a ti? Da, super sam. Hvala. Čast mi je razgovarati vama jer slušam puno vaše glazbe od 2023. godine. Znači, glazba mi se jako sviđa i mislim da je to baš ono što nam stvarno treba na ljestvicama ovih dana.

Source Sentence: The results are in and, drum roll, please, it's completely consistent with my family history. 89.9% British and Irish with most of that concentrated in the scottish borders, western Ireland, Wales, and cornwall. It doesn't show much breton tho so either they're so close to cornish they don't show as different in me or my breton family wasn't originally from there.
Translation: Rezultati su u i, bubnjevi, molim, to je u potpunosti u skladu s mojom obiteljskom povijesti. 89,9% Britanaca i Iraca s većinom koji su koncentrirani u škotskim granicama, Zapadna Irska, Wales, i kukuruzni zid. To ne pokazuje puno breton tho pa ili su tako blizu kukuruza oni ne pokazuju kao drugačiji u meni ili moja breton obitelj nije izvorno od tamo.
Reference Sentence: Stigli su rezultati i, pazite sada, savršeno se podudaraju s mojom obiteljskom povijesti. Britanaca i Iraca ima 89,9%, a najviše njih koncentrirano je oko škotskog graničnog područja, zapadne Irske, Walesa i Cornwalla. Nema baš puno Bretonaca. Ili su toliko bliski kornvalskim korijenima i ne pokazuje ih se kao drukčije kod mene ili bretonska strana moje obitelji nije izvorno otamo.

Source Sentence: However, Tenuk and Kayel quickly realized they weren't alone. A second dark creature shot out from beneath them, and Tenuk only just managed to avoid a collision.

Source Sentence: Tenuk hesitated, then stepped back, giving himself some space. With a low, slightly pained grunt, Tenuk's body stretched out, his fur replaced with scales and his arms replaced with wings. He quickly turned himself into a normal, light blue Thraki, but his eyes remained red.
Translation: Tenuk zaváhal, pak ustoupil, dal si trochu prostoru. S nízkým, mírně bolestivým chrochtání, Tenuk tělo natažené, jeho srst nahrazena šupiny a jeho paže nahrazeny křídly. Rychle se proměnil v normální, světle modré Thraki, ale jeho oči zůstaly červené.
Reference Sentence: Tenuk zaváhal, pak odstoupil, aby měl kolem sebe trochu víc místa. S hlubokým, trochu bolestivým zavrčením se Tenukovo tělo protáhlo, jeho srst se nahradila šupinami a paže se změnily v křídla. Rychle se proměnil v normálního, světle modrého Thrakiho, ale jeho oči zůstaly červené.

Source Sentence: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, secretary general of the Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins trade association representing some 7,000 wine producers across Europe, is dismissive of the concerns of the beer makers. He told Euronews that a market dominated by multinational brewing conglomerates bears no comparison with one comprised almost entirely of small, domestic producers.
Translation: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, generální tajemník společnosti Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins, která zastupuje přibližně 7 000 výrobců vína v celé Evropě, odmítá obavy výrobců piva. Řekl Euronewsovi, že trh, kterému dominují nadnárodní pivovarnické konglomeráty, není ve srovnání s trhem, který se skládá téměř výhradně z malých, domácích výrobců.
Reference Sentence: Generální tajemník obchodní asociace Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins a zástupce přibližně 7 000 výrobců vína v celé Evropě Ignacio Sánchez Recarte odmítá obavy výrobců piva. Pro Euronews řekl, že trh, kterému dominují mezinárodní pivovarnické konglomeráty, nemá smysl porovnávat s trhem, který je složený z převážně malých lokálních producentů.

Source Sentence: Isn’t that funny? We have half the manpower left, and we can’t even refrain from hurting one another. I hastily sped up, Al’s was around the corner, so I would be fine inside. A glance behind me ensured that I was no longer being tailed as I stood in front of a bright glowing sign that read, “Alborn’s Pawnshop!” With slower steps, I entered once again–this place was more under the cover, as Alborn would often take in people who’d been mutated and snuck into Paltricus. Upon opening the door, the lights had been shut off, interestingly enough–there was no Al. No refugees. Nothing. Something wasn’t right here.
Translation: Je to vtipné? Máme polovinu pracovní síly vlevo, a můžeme se dokonce zdržet od ubližování jeden druhého. Ukvapeně jsem zrychlil, Al'S byl za rohem, takže bych byl v pořádku uvnitř. Pohled za mnou zajistil, že jsem již nebyl sledován, jak jsem stál před jasným zářícím znamením, které čtete, Alborn's Pawnshop! Po pomalejších schodech jsem vstoupil znovu, toto místo bylo více pod krytím, jak Alborn by často brát v lidech, kteří byli zmutováni a vplížil se do Paltricusu. Po otevření dveří, byla světla zhasnuta, zajímavě dost tam byl žádný Al. Žádní uprchlíci. Nic. Něco nebylo Něco tady.
Reference Sentence: Není to legrační? Až polovina pracovních sil je nadbytečná a my se nedokážeme oprostit od toho, abychom si navzájem ubližovali. Zrychlila jsem, Alův obchod byl za rohem a uvnitř mi bude dobře. Když jsem stála před jasně zářícím nápisem „Albornova zastavárna!“, pohledem za sebe jsem se ujistila, že mě už nikdo nepronásleduje. Pomalejšími kroky jsem vešla dovnitř – toto místo vypadalo spíše jako úkryt, protože Alborn často přijímal lidi, kteří byli zmutováni a do Paltrica se dostávali tajně. Otevřela jsem dveře a světla byla zhasnutá, což je divné – nebyl tam žádný Al. Žádní uprchlíci. Nic. Něco zde nesedělo.

Source Sentence: So my dad can't give me rides to work. And for me, work is about 27 miles away. So there and back would be nearly a $100 a day with Uber. I haven't looked at Lyft. I could have, I guess, that makes sense. But I didn't have rental on my auto insurance, so that's my fault. So I guess I could have tried to do that and get that set up and tried to get a rental while I was down and out of a car. But even then, a rental wouldn't cover seven days. I'm going to sneeze, hold on. That sneeze sucked.
Translation: Takže můj táta mi nemůže dát jízdu do práce, a pro mě je práce asi 27 mil daleko, takže tam a zpět by bylo téměř 100 dolarů denně s Uber. Nedíval jsem se na Lyft. Mohl jsem, myslím, že to dává smysl. Ale neměl jsem pronájem na mé auto pojištění, takže je to moje chyba. Takže jsem se mohl pokusit, aby se to nastavit a snažil se získat pronájem, zatímco jsem byl dole a venku z auta. Ale i tehdy, pronájem by nepokryl sedm dní. Budu kýchat, vydržet.
Reference Sentence: Tak táta mě nemůže vozit do práce. A do práce to mám 43 kilometrů. Takže tam a zpět s Uberem by to bylo skoro 100 $ na den. Na Lyft jsem se nedíval. Asi jsem mohl, dává to smysl. Ale neměl jsem v pojištění auta půjčení náhradního, takže je to moje chyba. Asi jsem to mohl zkusit, pořídit si to a zkusit získat náhradní auto, když to moje bylo mimo. Ale i tak, náhradní auto by mi nepokrylo sedm dní. Počkat, chce se mi kýchnout. Tak ten kýchanec nebyl dobrej.

Source Sentence: Rosendale, a member of the hard-right Freedom Caucus, was one of the individuals who derailed the Wednesday votes. He views the top line number in Johnson's deal as being too high and as doing too little to cut the $34 trillion national debt.

Reference Sentence: Rosendale, člen tvrdě pravicového výboru Freedom Caucus, byl jedním z těch, kdo zmařili středeční hlasování. Zastává názor, že Johnsonova varianta jde na horní hranici a Johnson dělá příliš málo ke snížení státního dluhu ve výši 34 bilionů dolarů.

Source Sentence: South Wales four-piece The Now are proud to release their debut album, Too Hot To Handle, via True Music, and Callum joins me now. How are you doing, Callum? How's it going? Yeah, all good. Good, yourself? Yes, I'm very good. Thank you. It's a privilege to speak to yourselves because I've been listening to your music quite a lot since 2023. So I'm just loving the music, and I think it's something that we definitely need in the charts these days.
Translation: Jižní Wales čtyřdílný The Now jsou hrdí na vydání svého debutového alba, Too Hot To Handle, přes True Music, a Callum se ke mně připojí. Jak se daří, Callume? Jak to jde? Jo, všechno dobré. Dobře, sám? Ano, jsem velmi dobrý. Děkuji. Je to privilegium mluvit se sebou, protože jsem byl poslouchal vaši hudbu docela hodně od roku 2023. Takže jsem jen rád hudbu, a myslím, že je to něco, co určitě potřebujeme v grafech v těchto dnech.
Reference Sentence: The Now, čtyřčlenná kapela z Jižního Walesu, s radostí oznamuje uvedení svého debutového alba Too Hot To Handle prostřednictvím True Music a za mnou teď přichází Callum. Jak se máš, Callume? Jak to jde? Ale jo, super. U tebe taky? Ano, mám se skvěle. Díky. Je mi ctí, že s tebou mohu mluvit, protože tvou hudbu docela dost poslouchám od roku 2023. Úplně tu hudbu zbožňuju a myslím, že něco takového v hitparádách dnes rozhodně potřebujeme.

Source Sentence: The results are in and, drum roll, please, it's completely consistent with my family history. 89.9% British and Irish with most of that concentrated in the scottish borders, western Ireland, Wales, and cornwall. It doesn't show much breton tho so either they're so close to cornish they don't show as different in me or my breton family wasn't originally from there.
Translation: Výsledky jsou v a, bubnování, prosím, to je zcela v souladu s mou rodinnou historii. 89,9% Britové a Irové s většinou z toho soustředěný ve skotských hranicích, západní Irsko, Wales, a cornwall. To neukazuje moc breton tho, takže buď jsou tak blízko k popcornish, že neukazují jako rozdíl ve mně nebo moje breton rodina nebyla původně odtamtud.
Reference Sentence: Tak přišly výsledky a… prosím o víření bubnů… jsou úplně v souladu s historií mé rodiny. Z 89,9 % Brit a Ir s tím, že většina se koncentruje na skotských hranicích, ve západním Irsku, Walesu a Cornwallu. Neukazuje to ale moc bretaňských genů, takže jsou buď tak blízké cornwallským, že se u mě nezobrazují jako jiné, nebo moje bretaňská rodina nebyla původně odtamtud.

Source Sentence: Enlargement could not, except by deliberately sacrificing the balances too painfully achieved over the years, translate into a transfer from the countries of cohesion towards the candidates for membership, without coming up with other systems for the regions with the weakest incomes.

Source Sentence: Therefore, all I can tell you is that the only instrument at a European level that can prick the consciences of the Member States is this Parliament, and so I encourage you to put forward a motion or a parliamentary resolution to get this subject on the table, so it can be a wake-up call for the Member States' governments.
Translation: Derfor kan jeg kun sige til Dem, at det eneste instrument på europæisk plan, der kan snyde medlemsstaternes samvittighed, er Parlamentet, og derfor opfordrer jeg Dem til at fremsætte et forslag eller en parlamentarisk beslutning for at få dette emne på bordet, så det kan være en opvågning for medlemsstaternes regeringer.
Reference Sentence: Derfor kan jeg kun sige til Dem, at det eneste instrument på europæisk plan, der kan vække medlemslandenes forståelse, er Europa-Parlamentet, og jeg opfordrer det derfor til at fremme et forslag eller en beslutning herom, at det får dette spørgsmål på bordet, at det bliver en opfordring til medlemslandenes regeringer.

Source Sentence: on behalf of the ALDE Group. - (FR) Mr President, ladies and gentlemen, if there is one area in which all Europeans expect effective Community responses, it is that of large-scale natural disasters.

Source Sentence: However, Tenuk and Kayel quickly realized they weren't alone. A second dark creature shot out from beneath them, and Tenuk only just managed to avoid a collision.

Source Sentence: Tenuk hesitated, then stepped back, giving himself some space. With a low, slightly pained grunt, Tenuk's body stretched out, his fur replaced with scales and his arms replaced with wings. He quickly turned himself into a normal, light blue Thraki, but his eyes remained red.
Translation: Tenuk tøvede, så trådte tilbage, giver sig selv lidt plads. Med en lav, let smertede grynt, Tenuks krop strakte ud, hans pels erstattet med skalaer og hans arme erstattet med vinger. Han hurtigt forvandlet sig til en normal, lyseblå Thraki, men hans øjne forblev røde.
Reference Sentence: Tenuk tøvede lidt, men trådte så et skridt tilbage, så han fik lidt mere plads. Med et lavt, lettere smertefuldt grynt strakte Tenuks krop sig ud. Hans pels blev til skæl, og hans arme blev til vinger. På et øjeblik var han forvandlet til en almindelig, lyseblå thraki, men hans øjne var stadig røde.

Source Sentence: They wondered if she would actually let them enter, unlike the previous times they went to ask. I still have a bruise from the last time. Ivory chuckled from the memory. Kari had thrown a book at their shoulder, but when she saw who it was, she apologized immediately.
Translation: De spekulerede på, om hun faktisk ville lade dem komme ind, i modsætning til de tidligere gange, de gik til at spørge. Jeg har stadig et blåt mærke fra sidste gang. Elfenben klukket fra hukommelsen. Kari havde kastet en bog på deres skulder, men da hun så, hvem det var, hun undskyldte straks.
Reference Sentence: De spekulerede på, om hun rent faktisk ville lade dem komme ind denne gang, til forskel fra de andre gange, hvor de havde spurgt. "Jeg har stadig en blå plet fra sidste gang," fnisede Ivory ved tanken. Kari havde kastet en bog efter dem, men da hun så, hvem det var, havde hun straks sagt undskyld.

Han fortalte Euronews, at et marked domineret af multinationale bryggerikonglomerater ikke kan sammenlignes med et marked, der næsten udelukkende består af små, indenlandske producenter.
Reference Sentence: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, generalsekretær for handelsforeningen Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins, der repræsenterer omkring 7.000 vinproducenter i hele Europa, afviser ølproducenternes bekymringer. Source Sentence: Isn’t that funny? We have half the manpower left, and we can’t even refrain from hurting one another. I hastily sped up, Al’s was around the corner, so I would be fine inside. A glance behind me ensured that I was no longer being tailed as I stood in front of a bright glowing sign that read, “Alborn’s Pawnshop!” With slower steps, I entered once again–this place was more under the cover, as Alborn would often take in people who’d been mutated and snuck into Paltricus. Upon opening the door, the lights had been shut off, interestingly enough–there was no Al. No refugees. Nothing. Something wasn’t right here.
Translation: Er det ikke sjovt? Vi har halvdelen af mandskabet tilbage, og vi kan ikke engang afstå fra at såre hinanden. Jeg hastigt sped op, Al!s var rundt om hjørnet, så jeg ville være fint inde. Et blik bag mig sikret, at jeg ikke længere blev skygget, da jeg stod foran en lyse glødende tegn, der læser, Alborn! Med langsommere skridt, jeg trådte ind igen!Dette sted var mere under forsiden, som Alborn ville ofte tage i folk, der har været muteret og sneg sig ind Paltricus. Upon åbne døren, lysene var blevet slukket, interessant nok var der ingen Al. Ingen flygtninge. Intet. Noget var ikke lige her.
Reference Sentence: Er det ikke underligt? Der er kun halvdelen af styrken tilbage, og alligevel kan vi ikke lade være med at skade hinanden. Jeg skyndte mig at sætte farten op, Al's lå lige om hjørnet, så jeg ville være i sikkerhed derinde. Med et blik bagud sikrede jeg mig, at jeg ikke længere blev forfulgt, da jeg stod foran et lysende skilt med teksten: "Alborn's Pawnshop!" Med langsomme skridt gik jeg ind – dette sted var et beskyttet sted, da Alborn ofte tog imod folk, der var blevet muteret og havde sneget sig ind i Paltricus. Da jeg åbnede døren, var lyset mærkeligt nok slukket – og Al var der ikke. Ingen flygtninge, ingenting. Der var noget galt her.

Source Sentence: So my dad can't give me rides to work. And for me, work is about 27 miles away. So there and back would be nearly a $100 a day with Uber. I haven't looked at Lyft. I could have, I guess, that makes sense. But I didn't have rental on my auto insurance, so that's my fault. So I guess I could have tried to do that and get that set up and tried to get a rental while I was down and out of a car. But even then, a rental wouldn't cover seven days. I'm going to sneeze, hold on. That sneeze sucked.
Translation: Så min far kan ikke give mig forlystelser til arbejde. Og for mig, arbejde er omkring 27 miles væk. Så der og tilbage ville være næsten en $ 100 om dagen med Uber. Jeg har ikke kigget på Lyft. Jeg kunne have, jeg tror, det giver mening. Men jeg havde ikke leje på min auto forsikring, så det er min skyld. Så jeg kunne have forsøgt at gøre det og få det sat op og forsøgt at få en udlejning, mens jeg var ned og ud af en bil. Men selv da, en leje ville ikke dække syv dage. Jeg har tænkt mig at nyse, holde på. At nyse sucked.
Reference Sentence: Så min far kan ikke køre mig på arbejde. Og for mig er arbejdet omkring 43 kilometer væk. Så frem og tilbage ville koste næsten 700 kroner om dagen med Uber. Jeg har ikke tjekket Lyft. Det kunne jeg måske have gjort, det giver mening. Men jeg havde ikke lejebil inkluderet i min bilforsikring, så det er min fejl. Så jeg kunne nok have prøvet at gøre det og få det ordnet og så prøvet at leje en bil, mens jeg var uden bil. Men selv da ville en lejebil ikke dække syv dage. Jeg skal nyse, vent lige. Det nys var ikke godt.

Source Sentence: The results are in and, drum roll, please, it's completely consistent with my family history. 89.9% British and Irish with most of that concentrated in the scottish borders, western Ireland, Wales, and cornwall. Reference Sentence: Resultaterne er kommet, og de er fuldstændig i overensstemmelse med min familiehistorie. Der er dog ikke meget bretonsk, så enten er slægtskabet med kornisk så tæt, at det ikke kan ses i mig, eller også kom den bretonske del af min familie ikke derfra oprindeligt.

Translation: Europese bedrijven zijn niet meer echt Europese bedrijven, ze hebben investeringen in de Verenigde Staten en bedrijven zoals Boeing hebben investeringen in Europa.
Reference Sentence: Europese bedrijven zijn natuurlijk geen echt Europese bedrijven meer; ze investeren in de Verenigde Staten, net zoals Amerikaanse bedrijven als Boeing in Europa investeren.

Source Sentence: If you increase the percentage of shark fins that can be landed, the chances of increasing the number of sharks caught and of finning are greater.
Translation: Als je het percentage haaienvinnen dat kan worden aangeland verhoogt, is de kans groter dat het aantal haaien dat wordt gevangen en gevinnen, toeneemt.
Reference Sentence: Door het percentage haaienvinnen dat aan wal mag worden gebracht te verhogen, neemt ook het risico toe dat er meer haaien worden gevangen en gevind.

Source Sentence: Only when corruption has genuinely been eradicated in European countries should we try reverting to the imperious recommendations granted to various countries in the resolutions adopted, unfortunately, by us.
Translation: Pas wanneer de corruptie in de Europese landen werkelijk is uitgeroeid, moeten we proberen terug te keren naar de onversaagde aanbevelingen die in de resoluties die we helaas hebben aangenomen aan verschillende landen zijn gegeven.
Reference Sentence: En als de corruptie in de Europese lidstaten echt is uitgeroeid, laten we dan proberen de keizerlijke orders opnieuw in te voeren. Die kunnen we dan in onze resoluties uitdelen aan uiteenlopende landen.

Source Sentence: The review of the eco-management and audit scheme (ΕΜΑS) gives organisations and companies throughout the world the ability to manage the environmental impact of their activities more effectively.
Translation: De herziening van het milieubeheer- en milieuauditsysteem (ΕΜΑS) geeft organisaties en bedrijven over de hele wereld het vermogen om de milieueffecten van hun activiteiten doeltreffender te beheren.
Reference Sentence: De herziening van het communautair milieubeheer- en milieuauditsysteem, EMAS, biedt agentschappen en ondernemingen in heel de wereld de mogelijkheid om de milieugevolgen van allerlei activiteiten efficiënter te beheren.

Source Sentence: Agricultural aid does not encourage over-production, because it is not connected to the volume of production and is based on surface area and number of livestock.
Translation: Landbouwsteun is niet bevorderlijk voor de overproductie, omdat deze niet met de omvang van de productie samenhangt en gebaseerd is op oppervlakte en aantal dieren.
Reference Sentence: Landbouwsubsidie draagt niet bij tot overproductie, omdat ze is losgekoppeld van het productieniveau en gebaseerd is op arealen en de hoeveelheid vee.

Source Sentence: I am going to refer primarily to the Commission communication on the future for the market in fisheries products in the European Union.

Source Sentence: However, Tenuk and Kayel quickly realized they weren't alone. A second dark creature shot out from beneath them, and Tenuk only just managed to avoid a collision.

Reference Sentence: Maar Tenuk en Kayel hadden al snel door dat ze niet alleen waren. Een tweede duister wezen schoot onder hen vandaan en Tenuk wist maar net een botsing te voorkomen.

Source Sentence: Tenuk hesitated, then stepped back, giving himself some space. With a low, slightly pained grunt, Tenuk's body stretched out, his fur replaced with scales and his arms replaced with wings. He quickly turned himself into a normal, light blue Thraki, but his eyes remained red.
Translation: Tenuk aarzelde, stapte dan terug, gaf zichzelf wat ruimte. Met een lage, licht gepijnigde grunt, Tenuk's lichaam uitgestrekt, zijn vacht vervangen door schubben en zijn armen vervangen door vleugels. Hij veranderde zich snel in een normale, lichtblauwe Thraki, maar zijn ogen bleven rood.
Reference Sentence: Tenuk aarzelde en deed een stap terug om zichzelf wat ruimte te geven. Met een langzame, ietwat gepijnigde grom strekte zijn lichaam zich uit. Zijn vacht veranderde in schubben en zijn armen werden vleugels. Hij veranderde zichzelf snel in een normale, lichtblauwe thraki, maar zijn ogen bleven rood.

Source Sentence: They wondered if she would actually let them enter, unlike the previous times they went to ask. I still have a bruise from the last time. Ivory chuckled from the memory. Kari had thrown a book at their shoulder, but when she saw who it was, she apologized immediately.

Source Sentence: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, secretary general of the Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins trade association representing some 7,000 wine producers across Europe, is dismissive of the concerns of the beer makers. He told Euronews that a market dominated by multinational brewing conglomerates bears no comparison with one comprised almost entirely of small, domestic producers.
Translation: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, secretaris-generaal van het Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins handelsvereniging die ongeveer 7.000 wijnproducenten in heel Europa vertegenwoordigt, ontkent de bezorgdheid van de bierproducenten. Hij vertelde Euronews dat een markt die gedomineerd wordt door multinationale brouwconglomeraten geen vergelijking heeft met een markt die bijna geheel bestaat uit kleine binnenlandse producenten.
Reference Sentence: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, secretaris-generaal van de branchevereniging Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins, die circa 7000 wijnproducenten in heel Europa vertegenwoordigt, wuift de bezwaren van de bierbrouwers weg. Tegen Euronews zei hij dat een markt die gedomineerd wordt door internationaal opererende brouwerijconglomeraten in de verste verte niet vergeleken kan worden met een markt die bestaat uit kleine, binnenlandse producenten.

Source Sentence: Isn’t that funny? We have half the manpower left, and we can’t even refrain from hurting one another. I hastily sped up, Al’s was around the corner, so I would be fine inside. A glance behind me ensured that I was no longer being tailed as I stood in front of a bright glowing sign that read, “Alborn’s Pawnshop!” With slower steps, I entered once again–this place was more under the cover, as Alborn would often take in people who’d been mutated and snuck into Paltricus. Upon opening the door, the lights had been shut off, interestingly enough–there was no Al. No refugees. Nothing. Something wasn’t right here.
Translation: Is dat niet grappig? We hebben de helft van de mankracht over, en we kunnen niet eens afzien van elkaar pijn te doen. Ik haastig omhoog, Al. was Al. Om de hoek, dus ik zou prima binnen zijn. Een blik achter me ervoor gezorgd dat ik niet langer werd gevolgd als ik stond voor een helder gloeiend teken dat lezen, .Alborn . Alborn . Pawnshop! . Met langzamere stappen, Ik ging weer deze plaats was meer onder de dekking, zoals Alborn zou vaak nemen in mensen die werden gemuteerd en stiekem in Paltricus. Op het openen van de deur, het licht was uitgeschakeld, interessant genoeg was er geen Al. Geen vluchtelingen. Niets. Iets was er niet recht hier.
Reference Sentence: Is het niet bizar? De helft van de mensheid is overgebleven en nog kunnen we niet stoppen met elkaar te kwetsen. Haastig versnelde ik mijn pas, de winkel van Al was net om de hoek en binnen zou ik veilig zijn. Voor de helverlichte naam van "Alborn's Pawnshop!" keek ik nog even snel achterom om er zeker van te zijn dat ik niet meer achtervolgd werd. Met tragere passen stapte ik weer een deur binnen. Deze zaak was wat heimelijker, omdat Alborn vaak mensen in huis nam die gemuteerd waren en stiekem Paltricus binnengekomen waren. Binnen brandde geen licht en, gek genoeg, was Al er ook niet. Geen vluchtelingen. Niets. Hier klopte iets niet.

Source Sentence: So my dad can't give me rides to work. And for me, work is about 27 miles away. So there and back would be nearly a $100 a day with Uber. I haven't looked at Lyft. I'm going to sneeze, hold on. That sneeze sucked.
Translation: Dus mijn vader kan me geen ritjes naar het werk geven. En voor mij, werk is ongeveer 27 mijl afstand. Dus daar en terug zou bijna een $ 100 per dag met Uber. Ik heb niet gekeken naar Lyft. Ik had kunnen hebben, denk ik, dat is logisch. Maar ik had geen verhuur op mijn auto verzekering, dus dat is mijn schuld. Dus ik denk dat ik heb kunnen proberen om dat te doen en krijgen dat opgezet en probeerde om een huurauto te krijgen terwijl ik beneden en uit een auto. Maar zelfs dan, een huur zou niet dekken zeven dagen. Ik ga niezen, houden. Die nies zuigt.

Source Sentence: The results are in and, drum roll, please, it's completely consistent with my family history. 89.9% British and Irish with most of that concentrated in the scottish borders, western Ireland, Wales, and cornwall. Reference Sentence: De resultaten zijn binnen en – tromroffel graag – ze kloppen volledig met mijn familiegeschiedenis. 89,9% Brits en Iers, met name geconcentreerd aan de Schotse grenzen, West-Ierland, Wales en Cornwall. Source Sentence: Mr President, Commissioner, ladies and gentlemen, shortly after this Parliament was voted in, we were immediately faced with the issue of suspending the Generalised System of Preferences (GSP+), in particular, with regard to the application or nonapplication of this mechanism to Sri Lanka and Colombia.
Translation: Härra juhataja, volinik, daamid ja härrad, varsti pärast Euroopa Parlamendi hääletust seisime kohe silmitsi üldise tariifsete soodustuste süsteemi (GSP+) peatamise küsimusega, eelkõige seoses selle mehhanismi kohaldamise või kohaldamata jätmisega Sri Lankale ja Colombiale.
Reference Sentence: Kallid kolleegid! Varsti pärast seda, kui käesolev parlament ametisse hääletati, seisime kohe silmitsi küsimusega kas peatada üldiste soodustuste süsteemi (GSP+), iseäranis antud mehhanismi Sri Lankale ja Colombiale kohaldamise või mittekohaldamise suhtes.

Reference Sentence: Lisaks takistab Euroopa teadlaste tööturu struktuuriline killustatus teadlaste riikidevahelist liikuvust Euroopa Liidu sees - seda eelkõige avatud ja saavutustel põhineva värbamistava puudumise ning kultuuriliste eripärade tõttu ning samuti äärmiselt liikuvate töötajate ette kerkivate probleemide tõttu näiteks sotsiaalkindlustuse, maksustamise ja täiendavate pensioniõiguste valdkonnas.

Source Sentence: Tenuk hesitated, then stepped back, giving himself some space. With a low, slightly pained grunt, Tenuk's body stretched out, his fur replaced with scales and his arms replaced with wings. He quickly turned himself into a normal, light blue Thraki, but his eyes remained red.
Translation: Tenuk kõhkles, siis astus tagasi, andes endale ruumi. Madala, kergelt valuliku gruntiga venitas Tenuki keha välja, tema karusnahk asendati soomustega ja käed asendati tiibadega. Ta muutis end kiiresti normaalseks, helesiniseks Thrakiks, kuid tema silmad jäid punaseks.
Reference Sentence: Tenuk kõhkles, astus siis tahapoole, jättes endale natuke ruumi. Madala, veidi valusa nurina saatel venis Tenuki keha välja, tema karv asendus soomustega ja tema käed asendusid tiibadega. Ta muutis end kiiresti tavaliseks helesiniseks Thrakiks, aga ta silmad jäid punaseks.

Source Sentence: Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, secretary general of the Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins trade association representing some 7,000 wine producers across Europe, is dismissive of the concerns of the beer makers. He told Euronews that a market dominated by multinational brewing conglomerates bears no comparison with one comprised almost entirely of small, domestic producers.
Translation: Comité Européen des Entreprises Vinsi kaubandusühenduse peasekretär Ignacio Sánchez Recarte, kes esindab umbes 7000 veinitootjat kogu Euroopas, eirab õlletootjate muret. Ta ütles Euronewsile, et turg, kus domineerivad rahvusvahelised õllekonglomeraadid, ei ole võrreldav peaaegu täielikult väikeste kodumaiste tootjatega.
Reference Sentence: Enam kui 7000 Euroopa veinitootjat esindava kaubandusassotsiatsiooni Comité Européen des Entreprises Vins peasekretär Ignacio Sanchez Recarte on õlletootjate murede suhtes tõrjuv. Ta ütles Euronewsile, et rahvusvaheliste õllekonglomeraatide poolt domineeritud turg ei ole võrreldav turuga, mis koosneb peaaegu täielikult väikestest kodumaistest tootjatest.

Source Sentence: Isn’t that funny? We have half the manpower left, and we can’t even refrain from hurting one another. I hastily sped up, Al’s was around the corner, so I would be fine inside. A glance behind me ensured that I was no longer being tailed as I stood in front of a bright glowing sign that read, “Alborn’s Pawnshop!” With slower steps, I entered once again–this place was more under the cover, as Alborn would often take in people who’d been mutated and snuck into Paltricus. Upon opening the door, the lights had been shut off, interestingly enough–there was no Al. No refugees. Nothing. Something wasn’t right here.
Translation: Kas pole see naljakas? Meil on pool inimjõudu jäänud ja me ei saa isegi hoiduda üksteisele haiget tegemast. Al ei olnud kiirustades üles tõusnud, Al's oli nurga taga, nii et mul oleks sees hea. Pilk minu taga taga taga taga taga taga taga, et ma ei olnud enam sabas, kui ma seisin särava märgi ees, mis luges, "Alborn's Pawnshop!" Aeglasemate sammudega, ma astusin siin jälle sisse - see koht oli rohkem Alborni all.
Reference Sentence: Kas pole naljakas? Meist on ainult pooled järel ja me ei suuda hoiduda teineteise vigastamisest. Ma läksin kiiresti ees ära, Al'i pood oli nurga taga, seal sees oli turvaline. Pilk selja taha kinnitas, et mind ei jälitatud enam, kui ma seisin poe ees, millel oli ere särav silt, kust võis lugeda „Alborni pandimaja!“ Aeglasemal sammul astusin uuesti sisse – see koht oli rohkem peidetud, sest Alborn võttis tihti enda hoole all muteerunud inimesi ja aitas neil hiilida Paltricusesse. Kui ukse avasin, siis nägin, et tuled olid välja lülitatud, huvitaval kombel ei olnud siin Ali. Polnud põgenikke. Polnud midagi. Miski ei olnud siin õige.

I'm going to sneeze, hold on. That sneeze sucked.
Translation: Nii et mu isa ei saa mulle sõidud tööle anda. Ja minu jaoks on töö umbes 27 miili kaugusel. Nii et seal ja tagasi oleks Uberiga peaaegu 100 dollarit päevas. Ma ei ole Lyfti vaadanud. Reference Sentence: Nii, mu isa ei saa mind tööle sõidutada. Minu puhul on töö umbes 27 miili kaugusel. Seega sinna ja tagasi jõudmiseks kuluks peaaegu 100 dollarit päevas, kui kasutada Uberit. Source Sentence: South Wales four-piece The Now are proud to release their debut album, Too Hot To Handle, via True Music, and Callum joins me now. How are you doing, Callum? How's it going? Translation: Lõuna-Walesi neljaosaline The Now on uhke, et nad annavad välja oma debüütalbumi "Too Hot To Handle" True Music kaudu ja Callum liitub minuga nüüd. Kuidas sul läheb, Callum? Nii et ma arvan, et see on midagi, mida me kindlasti vajame.

Source Sentence: The results are in and, drum roll, please, it's completely consistent with my family history. 89.9% British and Irish with most of that concentrated in the scottish borders, western Ireland, Wales, and cornwall. It doesn't show much breton tho so either they're so close to cornish they don't show as different in me or my breton family wasn't originally from there.
Translation: Tulemused on ja, trummirull, palun, see on täiesti kooskõlas minu perekonna ajalooga. 89,9% Briti ja Iirimaa koos enamikuga sellest, mis on koondunud Šotimaa piiridesse, Lääne-Iirimaale, Walesi ja Cornwalli. See ei näita palju breton tho, nii et nad on nii lähedal maisile, et nad ei näita nii erinevalt mind või minu bretoni perekonda ei olnud algselt sealt.
Reference Sentence: Tulemused on käes ja, nüüd palun trummipõrin, need vastavad täielikult minu perekonna ajaloole. 89,9% briti ja iiri verd, millest suurem osa on koondunud Šoti piiri ümbrusse, Lääne-Iirimaale, Walesi ja Cornwalli. Bretooni osa pole siiski kuigivõrd näha, nii et üks kahest – nad on kas kõmridele nii lähedased, et ei paista minus eraldi välja, või ei pärinenud mu bretooni suguvõsa algselt sealt.

Source Sentence: Instead, we want the current UCLAF to be replaced by an office of fraud prevention with full operational independence, but not one that is a satellite organisation somewhere outside the institutions of the EU.

Source Sentence: The next item is the debate on the report (A5-0332/2001) by Mr Brok, on behalf of the Committee on Foreign Affairs, Human Rights, Common Security and Defence Policy, on the progress achieved in the implementation of the common foreign and security policy (C5-0194/2001 - 2001/2007(INI)).

Source Sentence: But the precise way in which these changes are to be implemented and, more remarkably still, the new conditions of service which will apply to new JET staff, are not included in the Commission proposal at all.

Source Sentence: The European Parliament has serious concerns about the deterioration in freedom of the press, about certain acts of censorship and about growing self-censorship within the Turkish media, including on the Internet.

Reference Sentence: Euroopan parlamentti on vakavasti huolissaan lehdistönvapauden heikkenemisestä, eräistä sensuuritoimenpiteistä ja Turkin tiedotusvälineiden lisääntyvästä itsesensuurista myös internetissä.

Source Sentence: The time has come now for the European Commission, taking seriously the work it has done to date, to develop a strategy which - as my colleague Mrs Járóka has also mentioned - will be able to put an end to discrimination and to call to account those countries that are lagging behind in terms of legislation.
Translation: Euroopan komission on nyt aika ottaa tähänastinen työ vakavasti ja kehittää strategia, jolla - kuten kollegani Jrkakin mainitsi - voidaan lopettaa syrjintä ja vaatia vastuuseen niitä maita, jotka ovat jääneet jälkeen lainsäädännössä.
Reference Sentence: Euroopan komission on nyt aika tarkastella todella työtä, jota se on tehnyt tähän saakka, laatia strategia, jolla - kuten kollegani jäsen Járóka jo sanoi - kykenemme torjumaan syrjintää, sekä vaatia selitystä mailta, jotka ovat jääneet lainsäädäntötoimissaan muista jälkeen.

Source Sentence: What I can tell him is that we are not going to carry out this study in isolation, but in collaboration with you. And not only with you, but also with those members of the European public who have something to say to us on this matter.

Source Sentence: She would, however, like to me to emphasise that without exception, all CAP reforms in Europe have allowed over ten years for the activities affected to adjust gradually to the changes entailed by changing from a policy of price support to a system of support for producers.
Translation: Hän haluaisi kuitenkin korostaa, että kaikki Euroopan YMP:n uudistukset ovat poikkeuksetta mahdollistaneet sen, että kyseiset toimet ovat voineet kymmenen vuoden aikana mukautua asteittain muutoksiin, joita hintatukipolitiikasta on tullut tuottajien tukijärjestelmä.

Source Sentence: The rapporteur, Mrs Stauner, and the draftsmen of the opinions of the other discharge reports and working documents, whom I should like to congratulate on their work, have based their work first and foremost on the annual and special reports of the Court of Auditors and on the Commission' s replies.
